title: Early Detection of Skin Cancer: Diagnostic Competency Enhancement Using an AI Ensemble Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic skin structure knowledge and awareness of early cancer detection importance
context.additional_context: Learners analyze real skin cancer cases in VR environments and participate in simulations via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance of early detection and diagnostic procedures for skin cancer.
Learners can understand the fundamental principles of AI ensemble models and their application cases in skin cancer analysis.
Identify malignant skin lesions with over 85% accuracy in VR simulations
Apply self-examination methods using a skin cancer risk factor assessment checklist
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
